item.title: ANZSCO 1 经理NFD
item.description:
ANZSCO 1 管理人员 MAJOR GROUP 1 MANAGERS - FLYabroad

ANZSCO 1 管理人员职责概述 - FLYabroad

经理计划、组织、指导、控制、协调、检查政府、商业、农业、工业、非营利性等组织和部门的运营。MANAGERS plan, organise, direct, control, coordinate and review the operations of government, commercial, agricultural, industrial, non-profit and other organisations, and departments.

ANZSCO 1 管理人员技能要求 Indicative Skill Level - FLYabroad

这一类别的大多数职业对学历和工作经验的要求如下： Most occupations in this major group have a level of skill commensurate with the qualifications and experience outlined below.

在澳大利亚： In Australia:

  • 学士学位或更高资格。五年以上相关经验可能替代正规的资格。 Bachelor degree or higher qualification. At least five years of relevant experience may substitute for the formal qualification (ANZSCO Skill Level 1) or
  • AQF大专文凭，高级文凭或毕业文凭，或三年以上相关经验（ANZSCO 2级水平）。 AQF Associate Degree, Advanced Diploma or Diploma, or at least three years of relevant experience (ANZSCO Skill Level 2)

在新西兰： In New Zealand:

  • 学士学位或更高资格，五年以上相关经验也可代替正规的资格（ANZSCO 资格水平1）。 Bachelor degree or higher qualification. At least five years of relevant experience may substitute for the formal qualification (ANZSCO Skill Level 1) or
  • NZ 注册文凭，或者三年以上相关经验（ANZSCO 2级技术水平） NZ Register Diploma, or at least three years of relevant experience (ANZSCO Skill Level 2)

某些情况下，除了正规的资格，还要求有相关经验和/或在职培训。 In some instances relevant experience and/or on-the-job training may be required in addition to the formal qualification.

ANZSCO 1 管理人员主要职责 Tasks Include - FLYabroad

  • 确定部门内部整体的工作方向与目标。setting the overall direction and objectives of organisations and departments within organisations
  • 系统阐述、管理、检查部门的政策和法规，保证实现目标。 formulating, administering and reviewing policy and legislation to ensure organisational and departmental objectives are met
  • 指导、协调财产与资源分配。 directing and coordinating the allocation of assets and resources
  • 亲自或指挥下属指导、控制、协调组织和部门内部的活动。directing, controlling and coordinating the activities of organisations and departments, either personally or through senior subordinate staff
  • 监控、评估整个部门的表现，调整政策和法规以实现目标。 monitoring and evaluating overall organisational and departmental performance, and adjusting policies, rules and regulations to ensure objectives are met
  • 代表组织出席正式场合、谈判、例会、研讨会、公共听证会和讨论会，并负责区域内的联络。 representing the organisation at official occasions, in negotiations, at conventions, seminars, public hearings and forums, and liaising between areas of responsibility

item.title: ANZSCO 11 首席执行官、总经理、立法者
item.description:
ANZSCO 11 首席执行官、总经理、立法者 SUB-MAJOR GROUP 11 CHIEF EXECUTIVES, GENERAL MANAGERS AND LEGISLATORS - FLYabroad

ANZSCO 11 首席执行官、总经理、立法者职责概述 - FLYabroad

首席执行官、总经理、立法者负责计划、组织、指导、控制、检查组织内部主要方案的整体运作，代表选区议会赞助者和地方政府部门。CHIEF EXECUTIVES, GENERAL MANAGERS AND LEGISLATORS plan, organise, direct, control and review the overall operations of organisations and their major programs, and represent constituencies in parliaments and local government authorities.

ANZSCO 11 首席执行官、总经理、立法者技能要求 Indicative Skill Level - FLYabroad

在澳大利亚和新西兰 In Australia and New Zealand:

  • 大部分职业要求具有与学士学位或更高资格相当的技能水平。五年以上相关工作经验可以代替正规资格要求。某些情况下，除了要求有正规资格还要求有相关经验和在职培训经历（ANZSCO 1级水平）。Most occupations in this sub-major group have a level of skill commensurate with a bachelor degree or higher qualification. At least five years of relevant experience may substitute for the formal qualification. In some instances relevant experience and/or on-the-job training may be required in addition to the formal qualification (ANZSCO Skill Level 1).

ANZSCO 11 首席执行官、总经理、立法者主要职责 Tasks Include - FLYabroad

• 确定并设置组织的总体方向和目标。 determining and setting the overall direction and objectives of organisations • 确定并制定政策和规章制度来控制团体的整体操作。 determining and formulating policies, rules and regulations to govern the overall operations of organisations • 领导并控制团体的整体操作确保目标的实现。 directing and controlling the overall operations of organisations to ensure objectives are met • 监视并估团体的整体表现，通过调整政策规章制度来确保目标的实现。 monitoring and evaluating the overall performance of organisations and adjusting policies, rules and regulations to ensure objectives are met • 代表组织出席官方场合、谈判、例会、研讨会、公开听证会和论坛，并在责任区内进行联络。 representing the organisation at official occasions, in negotiations, at conventions, seminars, public hearings and forums, and liaising between areas of responsibility • 确定、规划和制定政府政策、法律与规章制度。 determining, planning and formulating government policies, laws, rules and regulations • 调查向公众和选民关心的问题，并建议政府采取行动。 investigating matters of concern to the public and electorate, and proposing government action

11 CHIEF EXECUTIVES, GENERAL MANAGERS AND LEGISLATORS 职业在 ANZSCO 所处位置

  • 1 经理NFD / Managers nfd
    • 11 首席执行官、总经理、立法者 / CHIEF EXECUTIVES, GENERAL MANAGERS AND LEGISLATORS

      • 1111 行政首长，总经理和立法者NFD / Chief Executives, General Managers and Legislators nfd
        • 111111 行政长官或董事总经理 / Chief Executive or Managing Director
      • 1112 总经理NFD / General Managers nfd
        • 111211 公司总经理 / Corporate General Manager
        • 111212 国防军高级官员 / Defence Force Senior Officer
      • 1113 立法者NFD / Legislators nfd
        • 111311 地方政府立委 / Local Government Legislator
        • 111312 议会成员 / Member of Parliament
        • 111399 立法者制造业 / Legislators nec
  • 2 专业人士NFD / Professionals nfd

item.title: ANZSCO 1111 行政首长，总经理和立法者NFD
item.description:
ANZSCO 1111 首席执行官和董事 Chief Executives and Managing Directors - FLYabroad

ANZSCO 1111 首席执行官和董事职责概述 - FLYabroad

首席执行官与管理人负责决定、规划、检查组织的总方针和总方向，确保它们在董事会和理事机构的调控下。CHIEF EXECUTIVES AND MANAGING DIRECTORS determine, formulate and review the general policy programs and the overall direction of organisations within the framework established by boards of directors and similar governing bodies.

ANZSCO 1111 首席执行官和董事技能要求 Indicative Skill Level - FLYabroad ###

在澳大利亚和新西兰 In Australia and New Zealand:

  • 大部分职业要求具有与学士学位或更高资格相当的技能水平。五年以上相关工作经验可以代替正规资格要求。某些情况下，除了要求有正规资格还要求有相关经验和在职培训经历。（ANZSCO 1级水平） In Australia and New Zealand: Most occupations in this unit group have a level of skill commensurate with a bachelor degree or higher qualification. At least five years of relevant experience may substitute for the formal qualification. In some instances relevant experience and/or on-the-job training may be required in addition to the formal qualification (ANZSCO Skill Level 1).

ANZSCO 1111 首席执行官和董事主要职责 Tasks Include - FLYabroad ###

  • 为团队确定目标，策略，政策与进度 determining objectives, strategies, policies and programs for organisations
  • 为团队提供全面指导和管理 providing overall direction and management to organisations
  • 批准物力、人力和财力资源来实现组织的政策和方案 authorising material, human and financial resources to implement organisational policies and programs
  • 根据组织的目标与策略来监控评估团队的表现 monitoring and evaluating performance of organisations against organisational objectives and strategies
  • 与高级下属人员交流，检查推荐信与报告 consulting with senior subordinate staff and reviewing recommendations and reports
  • 准备或安排编写报告、预算方案并将其提交给理事会 preparing, or arranging for the preparation of, reports, budgets and forecasts and presenting them to governing bodies
  • 代表组织出席官方场合、谈判、例会、研讨会、公开听证会和论坛，并在责任区内进行联络。 representing the organisation at official occasions, in negotiations, at conventions, seminars, public hearings and forums, and liaising between areas of responsibility
  • 选拔并任命高级职员 selecting, or approving the selection of senior staff
  • 确定团体遵守公司法和其他有关的立法 ensuring the organisation complies with company laws and other relevant legislation

item.title: ANZSCO 1112 总经理NFD
item.description:
ANZSCO 1112 总经理 General Managers - FLYabroad

ANZSCO 1112 总经理职责概述 - FLYabroad

总经理负责企划、组织、指导、控制、检查日常操作，并通过部门经理与下属主管检查商业、工业、政府、防御部门的主要功能。 GENERAL MANAGERS plan, organise, direct, control and review the day-to-day operations and major functions of commercial, industrial, government and defence organisations through departmental managers and subordinate executives.

ANZSCO 1112 总经理技能要求 Indicative Skill Level - FLYabroad

在澳大利亚和新西兰 In Australia and New Zealand:

  • 大部分职业要求具有与学士学位或更高资格相当的技能水平。五年以上相关工作经验可以代替正规资格要求。某些情况下，除了要求有正规资格还要求有相关经验和在职培训经历。（ANZSCO 1级水平）Most occupations in this unit group have a level of skill commensurate with a bachelor degree or higher qualification. At least five years of relevant experience may substitute for the formal qualification. In some instances relevant experience and/or on-the-job training may be required in addition to the formal qualification (ANZSCO Skill Level 1).

ANZSCO 1112 总经理主要职责 Tasks Include - FLYabroad

  • 为组织规划政策，制定标准和目标 planning policy, and setting standards and objectives for organisations
  • 为组织提供日常指导和管理，并提供指导和支持的政策来实现目标、完成特定目标且把利润和效率增加到最大 providing day-to-day direction and management of organisations, and directing and endorsing policy to fulfil objectives, achieve specific goals, and maximise profit and efficiency
  • 根据命令与指示评估下属的相应变化情况。 assessing changing situations and responding accordingly by issuing commands and directives to subordinate staff
  • 同直接下属和部门主管，针对操作方法、设备需求、财政、销售、人力资源等问题进行商讨 consulting with immediate subordinates and departmental heads on matters such as methods of operation, equipment requirements, finance, sales and human resources
  • 授权重大政策基金的实施方案 authorising the funding of major policy implementation programs
  • 代表组织出席官方场合、谈判、例会、研讨会、公开听证会和论坛，并在责任区内进行联络。 representing the organisation at official occasions, in negotiations, at conventions, seminars, public hearings and forums, and liaising between areas of responsibility
  • 准备或安排编写报告、预算方案并将其提交给理事会 preparing, or arranging for the preparation of, reports, budgets and forecasts, and presenting them to governing bodies
  • 选拔并任命高级职员 selecting and managing the performance of senior staff
  • 可能会担部分或全部的会计、销售、营销、人力资源和其他专家的工作 may undertake responsibility for some or all of accounting, sales, marketing, human resources and other specialist operations

How much can I expect to earn?

Full-time employed General Manager earn an average of $1937 per week. The average annual salary for this job is $100724 excluding super. Learn more about salaries for this job​.

Personal requirements

* good oral and written communication skills * good organisational and time management skills * able to work under pressure * leadership skills * able to analyse and solve problems * good understanding of how businesses should function * interested in people, processes and resource management. This job also involves:
[Mainly indoor work](#Collapse "Click to expand or collapse") Workers performing these jobs would usually be expected to spend more than three-quarters of their day indoors, in an office, factory or other enclosed area protected from the weather.
[Reading or writing](#Collapse "Click to expand or collapse") These jobs require moderate or better reading and writing skills. Workers may be expected to prepare, understand or act on written materials, such as letters or reports. People may wish to avoid these jobs if their reading or writing English skills are limited to a small range of words or phrases and symbols. Jobs remaining may still require very basic reading or writing skills.
[Sitting for long periods](#Collapse "Click to expand or collapse") The main duties and tasks involved in these jobs are usually performed sitting down at a desk, counter, workbench or other location for periods of at least two hours at a stretch.

This occupation offers jobs at the following skill levels:

[Professional Jobs](#Collapse "Click to expand or collapse") Jobs in this group usually require completion of a recognised Bachelor Degree, or extensive relevant experience. Some jobs also require post-graduate study, such as a Graduate Certificate, Graduate Diploma or Master Degree.

## Study requirements
At school, you can study these subject(s) to get a good foundation for this occupation:
[Economics](#Collapse "Click to expand or collapse") School subjects that include some aspect of ECONOMICS provide a useful background to these jobs. In some cases an economics-related subject is a pre-requisite for entry to courses that provide the training for the job.
[Mathematics](#Collapse "Click to expand or collapse") School subjects that include some aspect of MATHEMATICS provide a useful background to these jobs. In some cases a mathematics-related subject is a pre-requisite for entry to courses that provide the training for the job.

[Find a related course](/Explore careers/Browse occupations/Details/Related Courses Details?Anzsco=111211C&State=ALL) Check the information for your state for details about specific education and training requirements.

## Duties and tasks of a General Manager
General managers may perform the following tasks: * decide on the organisation's objectives, policies and programs and set standards and targets * provide leadership for the achievement of policy objectives, increased profit or market dominance * assess the performance of the organisation and its activities * provide overall direction and management of the organisation's utilisation of resources, including personnel, technology and physical assets such as buildings * consult with staff and review their recommendations and reports * guide the preparation of reports, budgets and forecasts and present them to boards and other governing bodies * represent the organisation in negotiations and at meetings, conventions and seminars, and liaise with other organisations * select or approve the selection of senior staff * authorise funds to implement policies and programs.

## Related occupations you might like
[Management Consultant](Details.aspx?Anzsco=224711A "Management Consultant")

Full-time employed General Manager earn an average of $1937 per week. - See more at: http://myfuture.edu.au/explore-careers/browse-occupations/details?anzsco=111211C#sthash.OzYoIj4M.dpuf

数据来源： abs.gov.au 及 myfuture.edu.au

item.description:
ANZSCO 1113 立法者 Legislators - FLYabroad

立法者代表选区人民的利益，担任国家、州和地区议会，以及地方政府机构的当选议员。 Legislators represent the interests of people in constituencies as elected members of national, state and territory parliaments and local government authorities.

ANZSCO 1113 立法者技能要求 Indicative Skill Level - FLYabroad

澳大利亚和新西兰：

  • 要求有学士学位或更高学历。至少5年相关的工作经验可以代替正规学历。在某些情况下，除了要求正规学历，还要有相关的经验和/或在职培训经历。 In Australia and New Zealand:Most occupations in this unit group have a level of skill commensurate with a bachelor degree or higher qualification. At least five years of relevant experience may substitute for the formal qualification. In some instances relevant experience and/or on-the-job training may be required in addition to the formal qualification (ANZSCO Skill Level 1).

ANZSCO 1113 立法者主要职责 Tasks Include - FLYabroad

  • 制定国家、州、地区或地方政府政策，制定、修正和废除立法和章程。developing national, state, territory or local government policy, and formulating, amending and repealing legislation and by-laws
  • 帮助选民解决大量的问题，特别是关于政府和地方机构的问题。helping constituents with a range of problems particularly with regard to matters concerning government and local agencies
  • 调查与公众、个人或团体有关的事件。investigating matters of concern to the public and to particular persons and groups
  • 为政府引进建议书，代表公众和选民意愿。introducing proposals for government action and representing public and electoral interests
  • 为政府部门制定政策，控制地方政府机构。issuing policy directions to government departments and exercising control over local government authorities
  • 参加社区活动和地方组织会议，为社区、公众舆论提供服务和政府规划信息。attending community functions and meetings of local groups to provide service to the community, gauge public opinion and provide information on government plans
  • 可能担任过会委员会或询问处委员。may serve as a member on parliamentary committees and inquiries
  • 可能代表重要团体提出请愿 may present petitions on behalf of concerned groups

item.title: ANZSCO 12 农村管理
item.description:
ANZSCO 12 农民和农场经理 SUB-MAJOR GROUP 12 FARMERS AND FARM MANAGERS

ANZSCO 12 农民和农场经理职责概述 - FLYabroad

农民和农场经理 FARMERS AND FARM MANAGERS plan, organise, control, coordinate and perform farming operations in agricultural establishments to grow crops, and breed and raise livestock, and fish and other aquatic life.

ANZSCO 12 农民和农场经理技能要求 Indicative Skill Level - FLYabroad

在澳大利亚和新西兰 In Australia and New Zealand:

  • 大部分职业要求具有与学士学位或更高资格相当的技能水平。五年以上相关工作经验可以代替正规学历要求。某些情况下，除了要求有正规学历还要求有相关经验和在职培训经历（ANZSCO 1级水平）。Most occupations in this sub-major group have a level of skill commensurate with a bachelor degree or higher qualification. At least five years of relevant experience may substitute for the formal qualification. In some instances relevant experience and/or on-the-job training may be required in addition to the formal qualification (ANZSCO Skill Level 1).

ANZSCO 12 农民和农场经理主要职责 Tasks Include - FLYabroad

  • 规划和协调孵化场和作物产量的经营 planning and coordinating the operation of hatcheries and crop production
  • 培育和养殖牲畜和水产 breeding and raising livestock and aquatic stock
  • 监控和维护养殖作物的健康 monitoring and maintaining the health of stock
  • 识别和控制环境毒素、杂草、病虫害 identifying and controlling environmental toxins, weeds, pests and diseases
  • 组织开展农事操作，如维护建筑、供水系统和设备 organising and conducting farming operations such as maintaining buildings, water supply systems and equipment
  • 管理企业资金，监督市场活动，并计划生产以满足合同要求和市场需求 managing business capital, monitoring market activity and planning production to meet contract requirements and market demand

item.title: ANZSCO 121 农民和农场管理者NFD
item.description:
ANZSCO 121 农民与农场经理 MINOR GROUP 121 FARMERS AND FARM MANAGERS

ANZSCO 121 农民和农场经理职责概述 - FLYabroad

农场主与农场经理计划，控制，协调，执行在农业机构如种庄稼，饲养牲畜，鱼类与其他水生动物等农业操作。FARMERS AND FARM MANAGERS plan, organise, control, coordinate and perform farming operations in agricultural establishments to grow crops, and breed and raise livestock, and fish and other aquatic life.

ANZSCO 121 农民和农场经理技能要求 Indicative Skill Level - FLYabroad

在澳大利亚和新西兰 In Australia and New Zealand:

  • 本组大多数职业应该与学士等级或更高资格水平相当。最少五年相关经验也可以替代正式资格。某些情况下相关经验或在职培训附加正式资格证也是被要求的。（ANZSCO 1级水平） Most occupations in this minor group have a level of skill commensurate with a bachelor degree or higher qualification. At least five years of relevant experience may substitute for the formal qualification. In some instances relevant experience and/or on-the-job training may be required in addition to the formal qualification (ANZSCO Skill Level 1). 职责：

ANZSCO 121 农民和农场经理主要职责 Tasks Include - FLYabroad

  • 计划，协调孵卵处与作物生产的各项操作 planning and coordinating the operation of hatcheries and crop production
  • 哺育家畜与水生动物 breeding and raising livestock and aquatic stock
  • 监视与维护牲畜健康 monitoring and maintaining the health of stock
  • 确认，控制环境中的农药，野草，害虫与疾病 identifying and controlling environmental toxins, weeds, pests and diseases
  • 组织，指挥如维护房子，供水系统，设备等农场操作organising and conducting farming operations such as maintaining buildings, water supply systems and equipment
  • 管理商业资本，监控市场活动与策划生产用以满足合同要求与市场要求 managing business capital, monitoring market activity and planning production to meet contract requirements and market demand

item.title: ANZSCO 121111 水产养殖农民
item.description:
ANZSCO 121111 水产养殖农民 Aquaculture Farmer - FLYabroad

121111 水产养殖农民职业描述 Job description - FLYabroad

水产养殖农民负责计划、组织、控制、协调和执行农业操作，培育鱼类和其他水生动物。 plan, organise, control, coordinate and perform farming operations to breed and raise fish and other aquatic stock.

121111 水产养殖农民职位别名 - FLYabroad

  • 121111 海鲜养殖农民 Seafood Farmer (S)
  • 121111 鱼类养殖农民 Fish Farmer (S)
  • 121111 孵化场经理 Hatchery Manager (Fish) (S)
  • 121111 海产养殖农民 Marine Farmer (A)
  • 121111 贻贝养殖农民 Mussel Farmer (S)
  • 121111 牡蛎养殖农民 Oyster Farmer (S)

121111 水产养殖农民澳洲技术移民职业评估 Skills assessment authority - FLYabroad

移民澳洲时， 121111 水产养殖农民 Aquaculture Farmer 属于 VETASSESS Group B类职业，需要本科或更高级学位（Qualification/s assessed at Australian Bachelor degree or Australian higher degree level），如果取得学位的专业与提名职业相关需要近五年内最少有一年毕业后相关工作经验。如果学位专业不是高度相关，但有相关专业专业的专科，高级专科，副学士或研究生学历，需要近五年内至少二年本科毕业后相关工作经验。如果学位专业不是高度相关且没有其他相关专业学历，则需要近五年内至少三年毕业后相关工作经验。职业评估不需要雅思，评估函永久有效。本科毕业前的工作经验符合条件的也可以算作有效工作经验。
